headline: Altria's Global Modern Oral Partnership Might Change The Case For Investing In Altria Group (MO)
summary: In September 2025, Altria Group, Inc. announced it had entered into a non-binding global collaboration memorandum of understanding with KT&G Corporation to jointly pursue growth opportunities in modern oral nicotine and non-nicotine wellness products, as well as improve efficiency in traditional tobacco. This partnership includes Altria acquiring an ownership interest in Another Snus Factory Stockholm AB, signaling its intent to expand beyond traditional cigarettes and increase its global...
